description.en-us: Lotus Evora GT4 Debut series HW City: Street Power Produced 2013 â€“ 2014 Designer Kevin Cao Number X1618\n\nThe Lotus Evora GT4 is a racing version of the Lotus Evora conforming to GT4 regulations. The car was launched in 2010; numerous iterations of the car have been raced since 2010 to varying degrees of success. The car is powered by a 3.5L Toyota V6 mated to a 6-speed sequential.
